dashboards.description:
This is the main dashboards to monitor and troubleshoot vSphere VM Performance. This focuses on the contention metrics as they are the primary counter for performance, while utilization is the secondary counter. 

Operationalize Your World enhancement: 
added link to Guest OS dashboard.

resourceKindMetrics.metricName: Configuration|Hardware|Number of CPU cores per socket
resourceKindMetrics.label: CPU cores per socket

resourceKindMetrics.metricName: Summary|Guest Operating System|Guest OS from Tools
Guest|Peak vCPU Queue within collection cycle
resourceKindMetrics.label: Queue

resourceKindMetrics.metricName: CPU|Peak vCPU Ready within collection cycle
resourceKindMetrics.label: Ready

resourceKindMetrics.metricName: CPU|Peak vCPU Co-Stop within collection cycle
resourceKindMetrics.label: Co-Stop

resourceKindMetrics.metricName: CPU|Peak vCPU Overlap within collection cycle
CPU|Peak Other Wait within collection cycle
resourceKindMetrics.label: Other Wait

resourceKindMetrics.metricName: Guest|Peak CPU Context Switch Rate within collection cycle
resourceKindMetrics.label: Context Switch

resourceKindMetrics.metricName: CPU|Highest vCPU Usage of all instances
resourceKindMetrics.label: Usage

resourceKindMetrics.metricName: Network|Peak Usage Rate within collection cycle
resourceKindMetrics.label: Peak Throughput

resourceKindMetrics.metricName: Guest|Peak Disk Queue within collection cycle
resourceKindMetrics.label: Queue

resourceKindMetrics.metricName: Virtual Disk|Peak Latency within collection cycle
resourceKindMetrics.label: Peak Latency

resourceKindMetrics.metricName: Virtual Disk|Highest Read Latency of all instances
resourceKindMetrics.label: Read Latency

resourceKindMetrics.metricName: Virtual Disk|Highest Write Latency of all instances
resourceKindMetrics.label: Write Latency

resourceKindMetrics.metricName: Virtual Disk:Aggregate of all instances|Write IOPS
Virtual Disk:Aggregate of all instances|Read IOPS

dashboards.name: Performance/VM Performance (new)
